utterance.speaker: GUARD
utterance.content: Hello? Is anybody out here?

utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: All right. Twelve letter word for ‘transcendent’. Otherworldly. Honestly, sometimes it’s like they’re not even trying.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA RODGERS
utterance.content: Doing the crossword in pen. Feeling cocky today, are we?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What is life without challenges? Eight letter word for ‘estrange’. Ah, you are just in time, my mini thesaurus. I need an eight letter word for ‘estrange’.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: She doesn’t hear you, darling. She’s still talking to Ashley.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I should be timing that phone call. That’s got to be a record.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Please. I’ve had relationships that didn’t last this long.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: True.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Sorry. We were talking about the hiking trip next Saturday.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, has Ashley got the ‘all clear’ from his parents to come with us?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: They say they want to meet you, first.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah… they want to vet me to make sure if there’s some kind of rock slide that I won’t leave their boy stranded on a mountainside, having to gnaw off his own arm to survive.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: So you’ll do it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We’ll have them over for dinner. We’ll schmooze and impress them.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Would you like me to cook something?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No! We want to impress them.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: And what is that supposed to mean?

utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: So it’s meet the parents time, huh Castle? This is a pretty critical moment for you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Me? Why me?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, I mean Ashley is Alexis’ first love, right?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Mmhmm.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What do you think will happen if you don’t get on with his parents?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’ll lose interest in him?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh no. The exact opposite. I mean, it’ll make their romance feel forbidden and they’ll be off doing God knows what. Trust me. I know.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I never thought of it that way.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: My advice is keep the boyfriend close but the parents closer.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey guys. What do we got?

utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Something messed up. I’ve never seen anything like it.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Victim’s name is Marie Subbarao. She’s thirty five. Security guard found her last night. He’s still getting over it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Wow. She looks like an overstuffed sausage.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Lanie, what the hell happened to her?

utterance.speaker: LANIE PARISH
utterance.content: It’s called explosive decompression.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: From … what? What would cause this?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: It’s the result of exposure to a zero atmosphere environment.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Zero atmosphere. As in outer space.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Yep.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Or?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I don’t have an 'or' for you right now, sweetie. I have to get her body back to the morgue and then I may have some answers.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay well, her body’s in a car, in the middle of the rail yard, so clearly she wasn’t killed in outer space. There’s gotta be … another explanation.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Check this out. She was reading Taken By The Fourth Kind. A book on alien abductions.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So what’s your theory, Castle? That she was abducted and then killed by aliens?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well… a story that makes more sense is … alien abduction gone wrong. One that ends with Marie accidentally being blasted out of the airlock of the alien spaceship.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well, if it was ET he has a nicotine addiction. Found a cigarette butt by the rear tire. It was laying in the track, which means it was dropped after the car was parked.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: All right well, have CSU check for DNA. Maybe we’ll get lucky, and can you look into explosive decompression? See what else might cause it?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You got it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You do have to admit – the condition does seem … otherworldly.

utterance.speaker: KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: Marie Subbarao, the before version. Born in Chicago, did post grad at Johns Hopkins. Two years ago she takes a job at the Aubrey Science Center in Midtown … as an astrophysicist.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Doing what?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Not really sure. According to the Center’s website, she recently landed a grant from the SETI institute.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence SETI? That could explain why –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, it couldn’t.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So her working for SETI is just a wild coincidence?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m saying it’s an interesting fact that’s unrelated to our case. Aliens were not involved in Marie Subbarao’s death.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Um… I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Why Detective Ryan, I never figured you for a believer.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: All I know is my father’s cousin Raymond left this party in Jersey one night. He’s driving back to Queens and bam! Blinding white light comes down from the sky and the next thing he knows it’s morning and he’s on the Jersey Turnpike.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Let me guess, no memory of what happened.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That is not called an alien abduction. That is called a hangover.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Maybe. Raymond always was the lightweight in the family.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hmm. Speaking of family, did our victim have any? A husband, maybe?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Neighbors said she was single and lived alone. They barely saw her. Apparently she normally came home from work around ten PM.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Lanie said the time of death was around nine PM. Which means work was the last place she was probably seen alive.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What did she do here, exactly?

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: Uh, she analyzed the data fed in from our radio telescope in New Mexico studying radiation from quasars.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: For the SETI institute?

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: No, most of her work was NASA-related.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: When was the last time you saw her?

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: Uh … last night. She was still here at her office at seven when I left.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And what about you, Ms. Holder?

utterance.speaker: AYYANA HOLDER
utterance.content: Uh, we went over the calendar for next week, then she sent me home at seven thirty.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Was she having any problems in life? Anything unusual happening lately?

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: Not that I’m aware of.

utterance.speaker: AYYANA
utterance.content: Actually, since Monday she’d been acting anxious and uptight. I finally asked her what was wrong and she said that something life changing had happened to her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What was it?

utterance.speaker: AYYANA
utterance.content: I don’t know. Then on Wednesday she left work in the middle of the day. She didn’t come back until Thursday morning.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Dr. Vaughn, Marie’s body showed signs of explosive decompression. Was she doing any kind of research that would account for that?

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s a yes.

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: It’s called an altitude chamber. We use it to study thermal life support systems under reduced pressure, for NASA.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What would happen if a person went inside?

utterance.speaker: AYYANA
utterance.content: Without protective gear?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mmhmm.

utterance.speaker: AYYANA
utterance.content: Your lungs rupture from gas expansion and all the liquid in your body evaporates.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So all the horrible effects of outer space without the view.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who else had access to this area?

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: Mostly our researchers. And their assistants. Maybe … thirty five people in all?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ll need a list of all of their names. Did Marie have problems with any of them?

utterance.speaker: AYYANA
utterance.content: Ted Carter. Her ex-boyfriend. After their breakup things got ugly.

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: Can I ask what this is about?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Mr. Carter, your keycard was swiped at the Science Center last night at seven forty two. You mind telling us what you were doing there?

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: I went to see someone.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Marie Subbarao?

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: Why is this any of your business?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We’re investigating her murder.

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: What? Marie’s not dead. How could she be dead?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Someone put her in an altitude chamber.

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: Oh my God. Who could have done something like that?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: She was killed at around nine PM, not long after you arrived at the Center.

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: Not me. It wasn’t me! How could you think I would do something like that?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You had motive. You had access to the chamber. Why else would you even go and see her?

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: To ask her to dinner.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: After Marie dumped you and had you fired, you hoped she –

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: It wasn’t like that. I quit. It was too painful to be around her. Then on Wednesday, out of nowhere, she called me. She wanted to go to coffee.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Now why would she do that?

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: To mend fences, I guess. She gave me back some old T-shirts, some CDs she had of mine. Said she felt bad about the way things ended. I thought maybe we still had a chance, you know? So I went looking for her at the Center.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What happened when you found her?

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: Nothing! We talked for a few seconds. She seemed upset about something. I tried to find out what but she was in a hurry to get somewhere, so I left. I went home. I was there by eight.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Make yourself at home. You’re gonna be here for a while.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: CSU is going through the altitude chamber. Once they get back with forensics we should be able to charge Ted Carter.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Tell me this – how did Carter get the body to the rail yard?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, the altitude chamber is right next to the parking garage, so he probably dumped her body in the car, took it out to the rail yard, and tried to throw us off the trail.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You know what would be a better story?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hmm? We have an earthbound solution to this mystery and you are disappointed. I get it. But that? Really?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: C’mon. Marie said she had a life changing event. What could be more life changing than being beamed up by this guy?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: C’mon Castle, we all know that there are no such things as alien abductions.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yet most abductees report the same experiences. The white light, the memory flashes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s because they all read the same books, so of course they describe the same event. The dark, lonely road, the bright light out of nowhere, memories of being poked and prodded.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I believe the word you’re looking for is ‘probed’. And then of course there’s the alien implant that’s used to track the abductees.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That reminds me of the LEGO I got stuck up my nose when I was six.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You what?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Uh, guys? CSU finished going over the altitude chamber. Nothing turned up.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What? I mean, that was the exact machine we were looking for, right in the building where Marie and her ex-boyfriend worked. That had to have been the murder weapon.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: There’s no blood, no tissue. It’s clean.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That makes no sense whatsoever.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Check other altitude chambers.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s not like they grow on trees.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, that can’t be the only one around. And look for any other devices that cause the same injuries.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I’ll do my best.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: If it’s not an altitude chamber then what could it be?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Other than that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Beckett.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Lanie, what did you find?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Not the answers I was looking for. Instead, just more questions.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How deliciously cryptic.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Because of the unique nature of Marie’s injuries, I wanted to thoroughly document her condition before conducting the autopsy. While I was taking the X-rays, I saw this embedded in her sinus cavity.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What is that?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I have no idea.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Call me crazy, but that looks just like – – an alien implant.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What could you possibly be looking for by probing up there?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Can we talk about dinner?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, no… you couldn’t convince Gram to stay out of the kitchen. I will stock up on antacids and garbage bags.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: No, it isn’t that. It’s Ashley’s parents.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What about them?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: He’s an economics professor. The two of them are serious people, Dad. You may need to be more… buttoned up.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I can be buttoned up. And if I become unbuttoned, you can discreetly let me know with a brutal kick to the shin.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I won’t be there. They thought it would be better if it was just you and Gram.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re going to leave me alone?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: You’ll do great. I just … wanted to make sure that you’ll make a good impression.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Trust me. So do I.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where do you come down on deficit spending during economic downturn?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you. I take the theory that’s held by most economists: That deficit spending is acceptable as long as it focuses on public investments, like infrastructure, defense, education, research.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Wow. Where did that answer come from?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Semester of economic theory at NYU. Where did that question come from?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Trying out conversation starters.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, we started a conversation so … I guess it worked. Kind of.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s for a dinner with Ashley’s parents. He’s this stuffy economist, you know, and I just want to win him over. Get them on my side. But what if they don’t take to me?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh, c’mon Castle. They’ll take to you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So long as you don’t act like yourself.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh… nice one.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So, where do we stand on this mysterious implant?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It is not an implant. Lanie says that it’s a metal fragment and she’s running tests on it right now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How did it get up her nose?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, maybe it’s a piece of the altitude chamber that got lodged up there.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The altitude chamber we haven’t found.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yet. The altitude chamber that we haven’t found..yet. And I’m sure that as soon as we do, it will lead us straight to our killer.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I notice you said ‘killer’ and not ‘Ted Carter’.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, Carter alibied out. He ordered pizza the night of Marie’s murder and signed for it at eight twenty five.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Alibis in thirty minutes or less. So at this point, we have no human suspects.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: By definition, no suspect means no human suspect.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Well, one might be coming your way. I checked Marie’s phone logs at work. Turns out she made a 30 minute phone call before she left the Science Center on Wednesday.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: To whom?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Benny Stryker.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The Benny Stryker? This Benny Stryker? Benny Stryker, renowned author of Taken By The Fourth Kind?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: One and the same.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: An astrophysicist and a UFOlogist? Isn’t’ that like oil and water?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Actually, they used to be colleagues. Three years ago he and Marie were members of the same research team, but Marie was worried that all his UFO talk would destroy their credibility so she had him kicked off the team. From what I hear, there’s been bad blood ever since.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where can we find Stryker?

utterance.speaker: BENNY STRYKER
utterance.content: Imprisoned in a cold, white room. Strange faces staring down at us. These are images that will haunt us, but they’ll also unite us and help us remember. We didn’t choose this, we were chosen.

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: One more time. We didn’t choose this, we were chosen.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He’s like the Tony Robbins of alien abduction.

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: I see we have some new members. Maybe you’d like to introduce yourself. Tell us your story.

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: Do you actually think I had something to do with Marie’s death?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mr. Stryker, where were you on Thursday at nine PM?

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: At a book singing. In Queens.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But you did have recent contact with Marie. In fact, she called you on Wednesday. What was that about?

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: You know, I could tell you, but I see you wouldn’t believe it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Whatever you say will receive a fair hearing.

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: Well, that hasn’t been my experience. Marie called me last week in crisis. She picked up anomalous sub microwave bursts on her radio telescope. Was not just the background noises of the universe. It was a signal coming from somewhere nearby, with a repetitive pattern.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: As in, contact?

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: Or so she believed. So she booked more time on a radio telescope array and studied that section of the sky, which is when the trouble started.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What trouble?

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: Lost time. Four hours on Sunday, just gone. Then she started having mental flashbacks. A white room, a blurry face, questioning her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Are we saying Marie was abducted by aliens?

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: The classic indicators where there. I just tried to help her make sense of it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: After Marie called you on Wednesday, she left the Center. Do you know where she went?

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: She said she was going to get proof of what she knew was there.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Proof of aliens. And did she?

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: I never heard from her again. I assumed they stopped her before she got to close to the truth.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who?

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: The government. I warned her she was probably being followed. By men determined to keep the existence of aliens a secret.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s like that Will Smith movie. Only, I’m guessing, a lot less funny.

utterance.speaker: STRYKER
utterance.content: These agents are real, Mr. Castle. They fear the revelation that we are not alone would be too shocking. Hysteria would break out. Nations would crumble. That’s why they try to discredit believers like me and eliminate people who threaten to expose the truth. People like Marie.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Bookstore confirms that Stryker was signing his opus between seven and ten PM. Looks like we’re back to an empty space in the suspect column.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, but at least our timeline is making more sense. This whole Sunday-ish area. The life changing event? That’s when she was abducted. Wednesday she leaves work. That’s when she was looking for proof of alien life. Thursday she comes back to work, feeling better, until she leaves and winds up … explosively decompressed. Overall big week.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You know what this timeline shows me? A lot of erratic behavior that could be due to drug use or any number of medical conditions.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right. Let’s say that Marie is a drug-addled psychotic with a brain tumor. She still went looking for proof.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: She went looking for what she thought was proof.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Whatever it was. What if she found it? Where would it be?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: C’mon, Castle. You don’t actually believe that Klingons are behind this, do you?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Killer aliens is a reach, even for me. But government agents covering up the truth? Not so crazy.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes it is. I mean, when this is all said and done, it will all come down to where and how she was killed. And I bet it will have nothing to do with secret agents or massive government conspiracies.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’ll take that bet.

utterance.speaker: AYYANA
utterance.content: Detective?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where did everything go?

utterance.speaker: AYYANA
utterance.content: Two men came this morning with a federal warrant. They loaded all of Marie’s stuff into a truck.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who were they? From which agency?

utterance.speaker: AYYANA
utterance.content: They just said the government.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’d like my payment in small bills, please.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: My contact at Justice says no warrant was issued for Marie’s office.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well then, people claiming to be federal agents seized her property. I mean, there’s gotta be an explanation.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Men in black.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Other than that.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: I’ll put out more feelers. Meantime, keep me posted.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, thank you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Marie found proof and they covered it up. It’s just like Benny Stryker said.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you honestly expect me to believe a theory, any theory, that ends with “like Benny Stryker said”?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What else could it be? Who made off with all her stuff?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Maybe Marie was working on a classified government project and they confiscated her data.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Was her data in her furniture? Because they took that, too.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Without knowing who ‘they’ are, we can’t find them. You know, the key lies in the murder weapon. Esposito, tell me that you’ve located that altitude chamber.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I did. At the physics center. At Hudson University. It’s the only other one in five boroughs.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: See?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s clean. CSU just checked.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, there’s gotta be another device that does the same thing.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Lanie and I looked into that. The only thing we found was an industrial vacuum packer used for food processing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Check into every single one in town. We need to locate that crime scene.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Castle. Just prove that ET did this, bro, please. I hunt people, not machines.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m working on it.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe we should focus on Marie’s mystery Wednesday trip.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, finding proof of aliens will not help us catch our killer.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It will if she went somewhere with an industrial vacuum packer.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: If she did, it was off the Jersey Turnpike. Her EZPass account shows her getting off at exit nine.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where’d she go from there?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hard to say. I checked her credit cards. No activity in the area.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I am mapping it. ‘New Jersey Turnpike, exit nine.’ Let me share with you the many wonders that await us at exit nine. Oh, there’s an arts center. Uh… state park, with scenic hiking trails and canoeing. An astounding amount of day spas. And the Plainsboro Observatory.

utterance.speaker: JOY HARRISON
utterance.content: Yeah, Marie was here on Wednesday.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But she had access to her own telescope. Why would she need this one?

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: Marie usually worked with a radio telescope. This is an optical telescope.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So she came here to get a visual on something. Up there. In space.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: She said she picked up signal anomalies. She wanted to see where they were coming from. She took an image capture, then she left.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Could we get a copy of that image?

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: I checked the telescope’s hard drive. She erased everything. Coordinates, the image capture, it’s all gone.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: She erased everything? What the hell did she see up there?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Marie Subbarao, a sober-minded scientist, believes she was abducted by aliens after intercepting strange radio signals. Using a telescope, she photographs the source of the signal. The next day, dies mysteriously. Then her office is raided by shadowy government agents. I’m not asking you to dye your hair red and call me 'Mulder.' I would simply ask that you consider the possibility that Marie had knowledge of, or made contact with, something up there that somehow led to her death.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We will continue our investigation and solve this case and it will have nothing to do with little green men.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: They’re grey, actually.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle. The truth, the real truth, is out there.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Dead battery?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Maintenance just replaced it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: My phone isn’t working.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mine isn’t either.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Neither is my watch. You have a logical explanation for this, too, right?

utterance.speaker: AGENT EASTMAN
utterance.content: Marie Subbarao had information. Information we need.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where’s Beckett?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who are you? Where’s Castle? I am an NYPD detective!

utterance.speaker: AGENT WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Where is it?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where’s what?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: We all know what Marie Subbarao was involved with, Detective. That information must not get out.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, but we don’t have it.

utterance.speaker: EASTMAN
utterance.content: Where is it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Is this the part where you bring out the old Nazi with the dentist drill?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: If you don’t cooperate, we will find a way to get the truth. We’ll do whatever it takes to protect our way of life.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: From what? A woman who thought that she was abducted by aliens?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: You’re out of your league, Detective. You have no idea how deep this is. Now where is it?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who are you? Identify yourself.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What, CIA? NSA? MIB? Ooh… shape shifting aliens who only look human?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who killed Marie Subbarao?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: If you keep asking questions you shouldn’t, you may end up like Marie.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who killed her?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: No one you could ever reach.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What about JFK? Was that the second shooter on the grassy knoll? Third shooter, backed by Mafia? Castro? Mafia and Castro?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, whatever you guys are looking for, we don’t know where it is.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You okay?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, did that really happen?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Do I have a - ?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh. Oh no.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: ‘Cause you got a - .

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: This is outrageous. An illegal detention of an NYPD detective?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Who says the government is unresponsive? They’re all over this alien cover up.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Who are these men?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Agents, of some sort. They’re probably the ones that cleared out Marie’s office.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Well I’m glad you two are all right. But no one snatches up my people and detains them. I’ll get into this.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Those men knew who killed Marie and they refused to tell us.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: They also refused to confirm that J. Edgar Hoover liked to wear dresses.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hmm. Abducted by government agents, huh? C’mon, what were you two really doing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s not a hickey, Esposito.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You both have one.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I wish it was a hickey.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s from the injectors.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Is that what the kids are calling it these days?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: They were men in black.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where are we with the vacuum packers?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So far I have found over a hundred machines in the five boroughs. CSU’s checking them as fast as they can.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And the cigarettes?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No DNA match. But they are a Chinese brand, only found in Asia or on the black market in Chinatown.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So maybe she was killed by an alien. Just an illegal alien.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hey. Those hickeys?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I wish.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Okay. So, tech just went through your vehicle. Turns out you were hit with an EMP - an electromagnetic pulse – which knocked out all the electronics. And here’s how they found you in the first place.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Tracers, listening devices … they must have been watching the science center. That’s when they put these … accessories in my car.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe that’s what was up Marie’s nose. Perhaps they were tracking her, too.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No, it wasn’t a tracer or an implant. Lanie identified it as a spurgulus. It’s a rare calcification resulting from a sinus infection. The calcification is so dense, it reads like metal.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There you go. Logical explanation.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah. I would disguise my tracking implant as a rare medical –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You know, bottom line is that these guys were desperate to get whatever Marie took, so we’ve got to find it first because that will lead us to the killer.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, but we really don’t know what we’re looking for.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But we do know that they don’t have it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Which means it wasn’t in Marie’s office.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: She maybe hid it somewhere?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Maybe with someone she trusted. Somebody under the radar.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ted Carter said that Marie gave him some of his stuff back last Wednesday night.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe that’s not all she gave him.

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: I don’t understand. It’s just books and T-shirts, mostly.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mr. Carter, did you notice anything different in the things that she gave you? Anything that wasn’t there before?

utterance.speaker: TED
utterance.content: No, it’s all my stuff. T-shirts, Jefferson Starship CD –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ooh! This CD got me through two weeks of Storm Watch writer’s block.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t remember it being a two disc set.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This one’s unmarked.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Marie’s proof, perhaps?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, oh … wait. That’s it? I mean, no pomp? No circumstance? What’s on this could shake the very foundations of our existence. We need to pause and savor –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Please, let’s just stick it in and get it over with.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I mean, the fact of the matter is there’s probably nothing of any value on that CD to our investi –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You were saying?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No way.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Behold this image, gentlemen. And lady. We are witness to a stunning event, a turning point in history. The moment that we knew, we are not alone. For who can deny that this is an alien spacecraft!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It does kind of look like one.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, but this image? I mean, it’s gotta be doctored. Right, Beckett?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Woah.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What are you saying? Are you saying you think that this is real?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, it doesn’t look doctored.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, just for clarity, so we know later who said what, you are conceding that it is a possibility that this is an alien spaceship.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What I am saying is that we now know what these agents were after.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That close.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And as far as I’m concerned, let a higher pay grade deal with it. We now have leverage that we can use with our mystery agents.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: How? It’s not like we can just call them up.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hmm. Uh, we… do have a box of bugs. It’s the next best thing to a Bat Phone.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We have what you want. You know where we are.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You really think that’s going to work?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Please take a seat.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: So where is it?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Not a chance. I want something in return. The name of Marie Subbarao’s killer.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Ladies first.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Why are you showing me this?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s the photo that Marie took from the Observatory. Of the alien ship.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: I’ll be on my way now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait a minute. We had a deal.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: You said you had what I want. As it happens, you don’t.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: You’re not leaving. Marie Subbarao was murdered in the most awful way imagined. And her killer is still out there. You owe it to her. Give us that name.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Maybe she isn’t who you think she is.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What’s that supposed to mean? I mean, if it’s not this, then what? Why all this fuss over an astrophysicist who analyzed radio signals?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Unless what she analyzed was secret. That’s it, isn’t it? She intercepted classified information.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, you did say that she took something that was vital to our security. And we found Chinese cigarettes at the crime scene. Was she working with the Chinese?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Look, either you tell us the truth now or we take what we know to the media.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: What makes you think they’ll print it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, they probably won’t. But I know more than a dozen bloggers that will. Not to mention over half a million of my own followers on Twitter.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Nothing I say can leave this room.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: You have our word on that.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Last month we determined that an enemy operative had intercepted classified, coded data streams between the Pacific Fleet and the Pentagon.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You think it was Marie.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: The intercepted transmissions coincided with Marie’s tasking her radio telescope to point at our satellite, which is nowhere near where she was supposed to be doing her research.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So that wasn’t a photo of a UFO. That was your spy satellite.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: But the real damage done is the data she downloaded, which I fear is now in the hands of the Chinese.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So then who killed her?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Her handler, I imagine. The Chinese must have known that we were on to them. They were smart enough to make it look like the boyfriend did it.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Who’s this handler?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Someone from Chinese intelligence. We were never able to identify him. Whoever he is, you’ll never catch him. It’s over.

utterance.speaker: BOB LINDEN
utterance.content: In the book, I take a bold, new look at the linear aggregation of markets.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s about time someone did.

utterance.speaker: BOB
utterance.content: So Ashley tells me you’re an author as well. Tell me about your writing, Mr. Castle. I don’t read popular fiction. I find most of it crass and tawdry.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes. Right. Well, uh … I I think of my writing as character studies in human behavior, looking into the heart of what makes people tick. For instance, what would make an ordinary person like yourself commit an act that’s unusually heinous or somehow … out of character.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Would you excuse me for a moment?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Beckett.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Marie was acting out of character. What self respecting espionage agent would act strangely and risk blowing her cover? Maybe she wasn’t the real spy.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, that might explain the test results that Lanie just sent over. Marie had traces of sodium pentothal in her system.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Somebody gave her truth serum? Maybe it was the real spy. The white room, the questions, that’s why Stryker thought she was abducted by aliens.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, if Marie wasn’t the spy …

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Then the real spy was someone with access to the radio telescope at the Science Center.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m heading over there right now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’ll meet you there as soon as I can.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: More wine?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Got another request here, redirecting the telescope to the coordinates.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Signed by Marie, just like all the others. Well, out of character or not, looks like she was the spy after all.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait a minute. These two signatures are different. The As don’t match.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re right.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And look who else makes an A like that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Dr. Charles Vaughn.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He forged her signature to make it look as though Marie was the one intercepting the satellite transmissions.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So maybe Marie saw a request with her fake signature and she got curious. So she put in a request of her own to have the telescope scan that part of the sky.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So that’s when she intercepted the weird signals. After that she lost time.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And when she told Benny Stryker about it, he assumed she had been abducted.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Which she had been. Only not by aliens. By Dr. Vaughn, who drugged her to find out how much she knew. When he realized how close she was, he got rid of her.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, but he’s the one who told us about the altitude chamber.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, because he knew it would lead us to Marie’s ex-boyfriend.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Dr. Vaughn is gone. He’s not at his place. But you know what is? Three vials of sodium pentothal.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Any idea where he went?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Nope. But it looks like he left in a rush.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Call TSA and have him put on a no-fly list and keep me posted.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He’s on the run.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: If he heard we asked for those request forms, he would have been tipped off.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He probably had an escape plan in place, just in case his cover was blown.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And Chinese handlers who can smuggle him out of the country. Not to be negative, but the odds of catching this guy are not great.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Unless we enlist the help of a certain government agent who wants him just as bad as we do.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: I may want to put you guys on my friends and family plan.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We now believe that Dr. Vaughn is the spy. Marie figured it out and then he killed her.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: I’m inclined to agree, which leaves the agency with some egg on its face.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And which agency did you say that was again?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: I didn’t. We dug deeper on Dr. Vaughn. Turns out he has a fondness for gambling. He ran up quite the tab at an Atlantic City casino controlled by the Chinese. After that they owned him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you know where Dr. Vaughn is now?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: I know where to start looking.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Using his cell phone number, I can triangulate his position.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, he’s got to be worried about being tracked. He probably turned it off.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Then we’ll just turn it back on.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You can do that?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: We turned off your phones, didn’t we?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, and the car.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: He’s in the warehouse district in Chinatown. 1400 block of Canal Street.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Can we get a closer look?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: There he is. Fancy. You know, that’s just a few block away from where we found Marie’s body.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Maybe that’s where he killed her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And who’s that guy? Oh, wait. He’s the cigarette smoking man.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Otherwise known as Ung Kyu. He’s a high level Chinese intelligence agent.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So our murder suspect is meeting his handler.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Which means Dr. Vaughn may still have the data.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well then, let’s go get him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where are the predator drones? The black helicopters? All those SWAT teams rappelling down on ropes?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Budget cuts. It’s vital to our national security that we take these men alive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: These guys are trained agents. They probably have cyanide capsules in their teeth in case they’re caught.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: We’ll worry about their teeth when the time comes.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Patrol cars have closed off all streets in a five block radius.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: And air support’s on their way.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right. What’s the plan?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Vaughn’s cell phone signal has gone dark, which means he’s underground. According to our intel, this building has an extensive basement with two methods of ingress.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Actually, most of the basements on this side of town are linked through doorways used as escape routes for illegals in case of an INS raid.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: So you’re saying that Vaughn and Kyu could be in either of the adjoining buildings as well?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Welcome to New York.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Let’s go.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: NYPD. Stay where you are.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s a vacuum packer at one o’clock.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Looks like we found our murder weapon.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Have you seen this man?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: My partner is crazy and may start firing at any moment.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Go, go!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Semester abroad?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, TV show I used to love.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Huh. Nice job.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: KYU
utterance.content: Get on your knees!

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: No, please! I got rid of Marie. I did everything you asked.

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: Wait, wait! Wait, I can still help you.

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: Wait, wait! Please don’t! I can help you, please!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: NYPD! Drop that gun!

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: On the ground. Now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Cyanide capsule!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ew Gum. False alarm.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Where’s the data?

utterance.speaker: VAUGHN
utterance.content: In a USB drive. In his pocket.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Think we’ll get a medal for this?

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: This never happened.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Guess that means I can’t put this on Twitter.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Vaughn’s already spilling his guts.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, a near execution will shake your loyalties like that.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Between his conviction and the espionage charges, he and Ung Kyu will spend the rest of their lives in federal prison, thanks to you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And to Castle.

utterance.speaker: WESTFIELD
utterance.content: Yes, Mr. Castle. Might I have private word with Detective Beckett?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Of course.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey, sweetie. Look, about the parental review. I failed and I know and I’m sorry. Woah, woah, woah, woah … they … they found me fascinating? Camping with … they want to go camping with us? No, no! No, no, it’s … yeah, that’d be great. That’ll be so much fun. Mmhmm. I love you too. ‘Bye.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So what’d he tell you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ah, he told me something in confidence.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, I wish I could tell you, Castle, but … it was classified.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What … what did he tell you that was classified? Was it about aliens? The truth about UFOs? Are you going to tell me or just make me keep guessing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know. This guessing thing is kind of fun.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right. Was it about what happened at Roswell?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Area 51.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Loch Ness Monster is real?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ugh. You had me. They’re controlling the weather.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Our thoughts?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: THE END
utterance.content: CASTLE
